evento.noExistenGerentes: There are no managers to follow

carta.suscripcionesSubtitulo: Events in which we can participate
carta.suscripcionesTexto: In the Subscriptions section, you can see the events you have registered for and can therefore participate in. Also, if you wish, you can delete these subscriptions at any time if you are no longer interested in participating.
carta.solicitudesTexto: In the Requests section, you can see participation requests for an event that are pending approval by the event manager. This occurs when we want to request a subscription to a private event.

cuenta.funcionalidadUsuario: People with the User role have the possibility of having friends with other users and event managers on EventGO. Users will be able to share events of their interest and register for them if they want to participate in them. In addition, they can comment What did you think of the event?
cuenta.funcionalidadGestor: Managers can enjoy all the functionalities of a regular user, that is, they can share events of interest to their friends and register for events. On the other hand, they can also create their own events for the EventGO community
cuenta.funcionalidadAdministrador: The administrator can perform all the functionalities of the system. He can manage the categories of all events, create events and even share them. He has the functionality to moderate user actions within EventGO.

LOGIN_ALFANUMERICO: Login can only contain alphanumeric characters
LOGIN_TAMANHO_MINIMO: Login cannot have fewer than 3 characters
LOGIN_TAMANHO_MAXIMO: Login cannot have more than 15 characters
PASSWORD_FORMATO: Password can only contain alphanumeric and special characters
PASSWORD_TAMANHO_MINIMO: Password cannot have fewer than 3 characters
PASSWORD_TAMANHO_MAXIMO: Password cannot have more than 16 characters
LOGIN_NO_EXISTE: There is no user with that login in the system
LOGIN_PASSWORD_NO_COINCIDEN: Login and password do not match
USUARIO_BORRADO_LOGICO: The user is deleted in the system, please contact the administrator at admin@admin.com if it's an error
NOMBRE_ALFABETICO: The name can only contain alphabetic characters
NOMBRE_TAMANHO_MINIMO: The name cannot have fewer than 3 characters
NOMBRE_TAMANHO_MAXIMO: The name cannot have more than 40 characters
EMAIL_FORMATO: Valid email must have a username with letters, digits, and certain special characters, followed by an '@' symbol and a domain that can contain letters, digits, and special characters, with a dot (.) before the extension that must have at least two letters
EMAIL_TAMANHO_MINIMO: Email cannot have fewer than 3 characters
EMAIL_TAMANHO_MAXIMO: Email cannot have more than 40 characters
ROL_ALFABETICO: Role can only contain alphabetic characters
ROL_TAMANHO_MINIMO: Role cannot have fewer than 3 characters
ROL_TAMANHO_MAXIMO: Role cannot have more than 20 characters
DNI_ALFANUMERICO: DNI can only contain letters and numbers
FECHA_FORMATO: The date has an incorrect format (yyyy-MM-dd)
PAIS_ALFABETICO: The country can only contain alphabetic characters
PAIS_TAMANHO_MINIMO: The country cannot have fewer than 3 characters
PAIS_TAMANHO_MAXIMO: The country cannot have more than 15 characters
LOGIN_YA_EXISTE: A user with that login already exists in the system
EMAIL_YA_EXISTE: A user with that email already exists in the system
NO_CREAR_ADMINISTRADOR: An administrator cannot be created in the system
DNI_YA_EXISTE: A user with that DNI already exists in the system
RECUPERAR_PASS_OK: A new password has been sent to your email
USUARIO_NO_ENCONTRADO: The user was not found in the system
EMAIL_NO_ENCONTRADO: The email was not found in the system
MAIL_NO_ENVIADO: An error occurred while sending the email
ENVIO_EMAIL_EXCEPTION: An error occurred while sending the email
USUARIO_NO_EXISTE: The user does not exist in the system
NO_ELIMINAR_ADMINISTRADOR: You cannot delete the system administrator
PERMISO_DENEGADO: You do not have permission to perform this action
ARCHIVO_VACIO: An empty file cannot be uploaded
NOMBRE_CATEGORIA_ALFANUMERICO_PUNTO_COMA: Category name can only contain alphanumeric characters.,
NOMBRE_CATEGORIA_TAMANHO_MINIMO: Category name cannot have fewer than 3 characters
DESCRIPCION_CATEGORIA_ALFANUMERICO_PUNTO: Category description can only contain alphanumeric characters.,
DESCRIPCION_CATEGORIA_TAMANHO_MINIMO: Category description cannot have fewer than 3 characters
NOMBRE_CATEGORIA_YA_EXISTE: A category with this name already exists in the system
CATEGORIA_NO_EXISTE: The category does not exist in the system
NOMBRE_EVENTO_ALFANUMERICO_PUNTO_COMA: Event name can only contain alphanumeric characters.,
NOMBRE_EVENTO_TAMANHO_MINIMO: Event name cannot have fewer than 3 characters
DESCRIPCION_EVENTO_ALFANUMERICO_PUNTO_CO: Event description can only contain alphanumeric characters.,
DESCRIPCION_EVENTO_TAMANHO_MINIMO: Event description cannot have fewer than 3 characters
TIPO_ASISTENCIA_EVENTO_VACIO: Event attendance type cannot be empty
TIPO_ASISTENCIA_EVENTO_INVALIDO: Event attendance type must be PUBLIC or PRIVATE
NUM_ASISTENTES_EVENTO_VACIO: Number of attendees for the event cannot be empty
NUM_ASISTENTES_EVENTO_NUMERICO: Number of attendees must be numeric
TELEFONO_FORMATO: The phone number must consist of 9 numbers
DIRECCION_EVENTO_ALFANUMERICO: Event address can only contain alphanumeric characters
DIRECCION_EVENTO_TAMANHO_MINIMO: Event address cannot have fewer than 5 characters
URL_FORMATO: The URL has an incorrect format
NOMBRE_EVENTO_YA_EXISTE: An event with this name already exists in the system
EVENTO_NO_EXISTE: This event does not exist in the system
SOLICITUD_ACEPTADA: The request has been accepted, and a subscription to the event has been created
EXISTE_SUSCRIPCION: There is already a subscription for this event
EVENTO_CERRADO: You cannot enroll in an event closed by the event organizer
PLAZAS_CUBIERTAS: You cannot enroll in an event with all places already filled
SUSCRIPCION_NO_EXISTE: The subscription does not exist in the system
COMENTARIO_ALFANUMERICO: Event comment can only contain alphanumeric characters
COMENTARIO_TAMANHO_MINIMO: Event comment cannot have fewer than 3 characters
COMENTARIO_NO_EXISTE: There is no user comment for this event
COMENTARIO_YA_EXISTE: There is already a user comment for this event
GERENTE_NO_EXISTE: The event manager does not exist
SEGUIDOR_NO_EXISTE: The follower does not exist in the system
AMISTAD_YA_EXISTE: Friendship already exists between the event manager and the follower in the system
AMISTAD_NO_EXISTE: Friendship does not exist between the event manager and the follower in the system
TITULO_NOTICIA_VACIO: The news title cannot be empty
TITULO_NOTICIA_ALFANUMERICO: The news title can only contain alphanumeric characters
TITULO_NOTICIA_TAMANHO_MINIMO: The news title cannot have fewer than 3 characters
TITULO_NOTICIA_TAMANHO_MAXIMO: The news title cannot exceed 30 characters
DESCRIPCION_NOTICIA_VACIO: The news description cannot be empty
DESCRIPCION_TITULO_ALFANUMERICO: The news description can only contain alphanumeric characters
DESCRIPCION_TITULO_TAMANHO_MINIMO: The news description cannot have fewer than 3 characters
DESCRIPCION_TITULO_TAMANHO_MAXIMO: The news description cannot exceed 255 characters
NOTICIA_NO_EXISTE: The news does not exist in the system
